column4: i've changed the language back to english, and then the ubuntu changed the desktop folder to the home folder. how do i change it back to "Desktop"?
in terminal type    gconf-editor  From the left panel,select apps — nautilus — preferences. In the window on the right side, place a check in the box labeled desktop_is_home_dir.
in terminal type    gconf-editor  From the left panel,select apps — nautilus — preferences. In the window on the right side,  uncheck the box labeled desktop_is_home_dir.
